item.title: How to suppress alerts in Prometheus for non-working hours
item.description: When it comes to the topic how Prometheus and Alertmanager work together and how to restrict alert notification to fire only on working hours, typicall solution is to apply workaround to avaluated alert rule expession like this and ON() (hour() < 19 and hour() > 8) and ON() (day_of_week() > 0 and day_of_week() < 6) The full example of such rule is the following - alert: DummyWorkhoursAlert expr: 1 and ON() (hour() < 19 and hour() > 8) and ON() (day_of_week() > 0 and day_of_week() < 6) for: 5m annotations: identifier: "{{ $labels.
